com.feilong.core.bean

Class PropertyValueObtainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.bean.PropertyValueObtainer

  • public final class PropertyValueObtainer
extends Object
    属性值获取器.
    Since:
    1.12.0
    Author:
    feilong

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyValueCollection

        public static <T,O,K extends Collection<T>> K getPropertyValueCollection(Iterable<O> beanIterable,
                                                                         String propertyName,
                                                                         K returnCollection)
        循环beanIterable,调用 PropertyUtil.getProperty(Object, String) 获得 propertyName的值,塞到 returnCollection 中返回.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        O - the generic type
        K - the key type
        Parameters:
        beanIterable - 支持
        • bean Iterable,比如List<User>,Set<User>等
        • map Iterable,比如List<Map<String, String>>
        • list Iterable , 比如 List<List<String>>
        • 数组 Iterable ,比如 List<String[]>
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        returnCollection - the return collection
        Returns:
        如果 returnCollection 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        如果 beanIterable 是null或者empty,返回 returnCollection
        如果 propertyName 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        如果 propertyName 是blank,抛出 IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        1.0.8
        See Also:
        PropertyUtil.getProperty(Object, String), BeanToPropertyValueTransformer

      • getValue

        public static <T,O> T getValue(O obj,
                               PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor)
        Gets the value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        obj - the obj
        propertyDescriptor - the property descriptor
        Returns:
        如果 obj 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        如果 propertyDescriptor 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        See Also:
        PropertyUtil.getProperty(Object, String) 排序异常
